Author: moonxwitch
Text: i actually kind of preferred having flatmates, i always kept my food in the kitchen so knowing that they could walk in on me stopped me from going back for seconds or leftovers. now that i live in a studio flat i have to be mindful of how much food i buy/cook because thereâ€™s nothing stopping me from eating it all at once since no one sees what i do in the kitchen ðŸ˜­

Author: synedchdochee
Text: Having roommates and an ed definitely is a challenge. I don't purge but one of my roommates witnessed me mid-binge in the kitchen when he came downstairs once, and they both make comments that I'm not eating enough, ask me what I've eaten etc. Worst part is I've never told them I have an ED, we're all just around one another so much they've picked up on it. Let me starve in peace ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
